title: Raa'Tul Confirmed.
body:
Furi Kuri's video proved it.

His source:

https://youtu.be/mHzsNM_saQQ

An evil laugh when someone dies on the PBE-- or at least Malph to Blue Buff, not sure of all of the circumstances.

And according to Draaaaaven:

http://puu.sh/i34k6/c9284c4fad.png

Basically, another Darkin who watches over Varus-- Varus' bow is his. ADC. 

Neat. 

> [{quoted}](name=Godot,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=yVOeEqmr,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-06-01T22:12:23.346+0000)
>
> Raa'Tul is a voidling name though. 3 letter, apostrophe, 3 letter.

Interesting point.

Well besides Cho'Gath lol. But yeah the rest. Kog'Maw (of course without the apostrophe), Kha'Zix, Rek'Sai, Vel'Koz.

But yeah that's interesting.

> [{quoted}](name=F03,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=yVOeEqmr,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-06-01T22:26:01.056+0000)
>
> its davey jones you fools

Interesting theory actually. I'll +1, that's... Interesting. 

If this is the case, that could be the actual laugh referencing a GP update. This laugh definitely doesn't belong to GP.
